resume_sections.summary: Integration specialist with deep expertise in EDI (X12, EDIFACT) and B2B messaging protocols (AS2, SFTP). Proven ability to design, implement, and maintain complex trading partner networks. Strong background in SEEBURGER BIS platform and end-to-end integration workflows.

experience.title: EDI Analyst
responsibilities: Designed and built end-to-end EDI interfaces using SEEBURGER BIS
Configured AS2 connections including certificates, encryption, and partner relations
Established and maintained FTP, SFTP (client/server), and AS2 connections
Developed EDI mappings for XML, EDIFACT, and ANSI X12 using BIC Mapping Designer
Built mappings for ORDERS, DESADV, INVOIC, 850, 856, and 810 document types
Handled partner onboarding including requirement analysis, testing, and go-live
Monitored EDI message flow and resolved transmission, mapping, and compliance issues

education: Master's in Computer Science, University of Alabama at Birmingham, USA (Jan 2023 – Apr 2025) — GPA: 3.30/4.00
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science, Jain University, Bangalore, India (Jan 2019 – Jul 2022) — CGPA: 7.89/10
Key Subjects: Network Security, Cyber Risk Management
